label: axiom-instep-independence
name: Def Assumption Instep Independence
statement:
Fix a time $t$ and swarm state $\mathcal S_t$. For each walker $i\in\{1,\dots,N\}$, let

$$
X_i \;:=\;\big(U_i^{\mathrm{comp}},\,U_i^{\mathrm{pert}},\,U_i^{\mathrm{status}},\,U_i^{\mathrm{clone}}\big)
$$

be the collection of random inputs used by walker $i$ during the next update (companion selection, perturbation noise, status/death draw, cloning/parent draw). **Conditional on $\mathcal S_t$, the vectors $X_1,\dots,X_N$ are independent**, and the components inside each $X_i$ are mutually indep
core_assumption_text: Conditional on $\mathcal S_t$, the vectors $X_1,\dots,X_N$ are independent, and the components inside each $X_i$ are mutually independent.
